Dakwah Harus Jadi Cara Menghalau Radikalisme
07 Nov 2019, 17:09 by Muhammad Irfan
JAKARTA, (PR).- Penunjukan Menteri Agama bukan dari kalangan ahli agama menjadi sejarah baru. Namun belum lama dilantik, wacana yang digulirkan Menteri Agama Fachrul Razi sudah menjadi polemik. Pelarangan celana cingkrang dan cadar di lingkungan ASN untuk meredam radikalisme misalnya. Padahal radikalisme efektif diredam oleh jalan dakwah.Anggota Komisi VIII dari FPKB Maman Imanulhaq menilai di tengah masifnya informasi yang masuk, umat harusnya dikembalikan pada gerakan dakwah yang literalistik, pada referensi, dan berdasarkan atas dalil dan realita kebutuhan masyarakat. Dengan begitu anggaran pendidikan agama yang dikucurkan dari Kementerian Agaman juga akan menjadi lebih efektif.“Harusnya lewat pendidikan dan melibatkan organisasi keagamaan seperti NU dan Muhammadiyah untuk membina para dai yang mengisi ceramah di masjid kampus dan BUMN, serta melibatkan kementerian lain untuk tidak memberi peluang bagi para dai yang radikal,” kata Maman kepada “PR” di Kompleks Parlemen Senayan, Kamis 7 November 2019.Selain itu pemuka agama yang moderat sudah semestinya menguasai media sosial. “Jangan sampai kalah dengan orang yg pengetahuan minim agama tapi menguasai media lalu jadi panutan umat,” ucap dia.Sementara mengenai cara berpakaian, mestinya Menag tak perlu mengatur sampai sejauh itu. Selain akan membuat keyakinan yang salah kaprah pada pemerintah, gaya berpakaian itu tak bisa digeneralisir sebagai radikal.“Isu ini kontraproduktif di tengah upaya kita untuk melebur polarisasi pasca-Pilpres. Jangan jadikan isu radikalisme ini komoditas tapi diantisipasi lewat pembenahan kurikulum, pembinaan SDM, dan penguatan ideologi Pancasila,” ucap dia.Selain itu, penegakan hukum seperti pada ujaran kebencian juga harus dipastikan sampai ke bawah dan adil bagi semua pihak. Pasalnya masih ditemukan pegawai Kementerian Agama yang jadi bagian penyegelan gereja atau BUMN yang masih mengundang dai dari HTI yang sudah dilarang.“Tapi penegakan hukum juga harus disampaikn ke tingkat bawah karena dakwah kebencian bukan hanya bahaya bagi kedaulatan tapi juga kemanusiaan,” ucap dia.Maman juga mengkritisi istilah manipulator agama yang dicetuskan Jokowi sebagai pengganti radikal. Menurutnya manipulator agama memang harus ditindak, tapi tindak juga manipulator anggaran, data, informasi, dan berita.“Pemerintahan ini harus dibangun atas kepercayaan pada rakyat, harus adil pada semua, jangan buat polarisasi yang lebih tajam,” ucap dia.***

Da'wah Must Be A Way To Dispel Radicalism
Nov 7 2019, 17:09 by Muhammad Irfan
JAKARTA, (PR) .- The appointment of the Minister of Religion rather than among religious experts is a new history. But not long ago, the discourse initiated by the Minister of Religion Fachrul Razi has become a polemic. Prohibition of short pants and veils in the ASN environment to reduce radicalism for example. Whereas radicalism is effectively suppressed by the da'wah path. Members of Commission VIII of FPKB Maman Imanulhaq assess in the midst of massive information coming in, people should be returned to the propaganda movement that is literalistic, by reference, and based on the propositions and the reality of people's needs. That way the religious education budget disbursed from the Ministry of Agaman will also be more effective. "It should be through education and involving religious organizations such as NU and Muhammadiyah to foster preachers who fill lectures at campus mosques and SOEs, and involve other ministries not to provide opportunities for radical preachers, "Maman told" PR "at the Senayan Parliament Complex, Thursday, November 7, 2019. Besides that moderate religious leaders should have mastered social media. "Don't be inferior to people who have little religious knowledge but master the media and become a role model for the people," he said. While regarding how to dress, the Minister of Religion should not need to regulate to that extent. In addition to creating mistaken beliefs in the government, this style of dress cannot be generalized as radical. "This issue is counterproductive in the midst of our efforts to melt post-Pilarization polarization. Don't make the issue of radicalism a commodity but it is anticipated through revamping the curriculum, fostering human resources, and strengthening the Pancasila ideology, "he said. In addition, law enforcement as in hate speech must also be ensured to the bottom and fair to all parties. Because there are still employees of the Ministry of Religion who are part of sealing churches or state-owned enterprises that are still inviting preachers from HTI that have been banned. "But law enforcement must also be delivered to the lower levels because preaching hatred is not only a danger to sovereignty but also humanity," he said. also criticized the term religious manipulator Jokowi coined as a radical substitute. According to him the religious manipulator must be dealt with, but also the budget manipulator, data, information and news. "This government must be built on trust in the people, must be fair to all, do not make sharper polarization," he said. ***
